top_comments.comment: I'm learning that I am way more particular about my shimmers than I thought. I want the light shades to be as creamy as a Color Pop highlighter if possible! I'll build difficult dark shades but I lost all patience with flaky light ones. Since a lot of holiday looks really rely on those shimmers would you please point out which ones you think are creamy age friendly ones? I think this CG palette fit pretty well! ♡Love you! Prayers for your mom and all of you. 😌🙏💝☮🕉
"I've got a few things on my cheeks today." Em's Happy Place

I feel like those Milani powder blushes would be great to mix together and get whatever kind of tone you want! I feel like people often forget you can MIX blush and other face products. If a blush is too deep I just dip back and forth between my blush and my face powder and it lightens it!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Blessings to your mom, you, and all the lovely subscribers you have cultivated with your genuine, loving, warm soul. ♥️
It's always a treat when there's a new Emily video!  Maybe a look sometime that isn't rust/brown/berry?  Seems like all the demo looks devolve to the same basis result.
FIVE blushes at once….Yessss!!!  Love it!   So glad to hear your mom is recovering well.  Sending prayers.  💕
Hello! Good to read that your mom is better. I hope that she continues to recover from her surgery. Blessings
I have That's Rad. would love to see some inspiration to use it more.
Glad to hear your mum is recovering well. Emma x
